comparisonSecs.title: PRIVATE
comparisonSecs.content: Benefit from 100% data ownership. Define and revoke access rights. No one else can access your information, not even ThreeFold.

comparisonSecs.title: SECURE
comparisonSecs.content: Run and sotre your applications and workloads independently, without any intermediatires, on an ultra-secure network.

comparisonSecs.title: SUSTAINABLE
comparisonSecs.content: The ThreeFold Grid enables super-efficient end-to-end data transmission, with up-to 99% energy-savings.

cta.title: Made Possible by the ThreeFold Grid
cta.content: The ThreeFold Grid is a an globally-distributed network of storage and compute capacity which brings a smart, secure and efficent solution that allows anyone to connect capacity and participate in the internet economy. It is what allows your data and workloads to live freely, privately and securely.
